Authentication success. Email is not verified. Authentication failed. You should enter an email! You should enter a password! Failed to send reset email! Verify your registered email! We have sent an email with instructions to reset your password! Almost done You should enter your registered email! Invalid Email Your passwords should have at least 6 characters and a mix of letters and numbers Invalid Phone You should enter an username! We have sent an email with a confirmation link to your email address. Open it up to activate your account. Email sent! Permission granted! Permission denied! You should enter a name You should enter a description You should enter a location Announcement inserted Insertion failed You should grant this permission to see your current location! You should select a place on the map. The current location could not be found. The current location could not be found because the permission is not granted. You should enter some text! Comment inserted The pet image does not exist or could not be loaded. Announcement updated The user does not have a profile image or it could not be loaded. Location point inserted Location points removed Removal failed Be careful! You should have at least one point on the map so the other users know where your pet can be. Cancel Your changes are not saved! You should enter the old password! The new password should be different! Profile updated! Email updated! We have sent an email with a confirmation link to your email address. Open it up to update your account. Email could not be updated! Wrong password! Password updated! The user image could not be loaded. Announcement added to favorite Announcement removed from favorite Password needed! You have to enter your password to apply changes!
